issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Open Dashboard

h3. Actual Result
An internal error has occurred.
No more handlesNative code library failed to load. (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio/plugins/com.aptana.swt.webkitbrowser.linux.x86_1.0.0.1337568602/os/linux/x86/libcefjni.so: libjpeg.so.62: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)

h3. Expected Result
Dashboard

comments.body:
Just installed Titanium - first execution.  

ERROR
An internal error has occurred.
Could not initialize class cef.CEFJNI

Could it be an issue with the install?

Here is the diag log, if it will help...

Host OS: Linux
OS Arch: x86
JRE Version: 1.7.0_03
JRE Vendor: Oracle Corporation
JRE Home: /usr/lib/jvm/java-7-openjdk-i386/jre
Install Directory: file:/home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio/
Version: 2.1.1.201207271312
VM Arguments: -Xms40m
-Xmx1024m
-Declipse.p2.unsignedPolicy=allow
-Declipse.log.size.max=10000
-Declipse.log.backup.max=5
-Djava.awt.headless=true
-XX:MaxPermSize=256m
-Djava.class.path=/home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio//plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.2.0.v20110502.jar

Workspace Directory: file:/home/paul/Titanium_Studio_Workspace/
Language: en_US

Titanium Mobile SDK Version: 2.1.1
Mobile SDK Modules API Version:2
Mobile SDK Timestamp: 07/27/12 14:01
Mobile SDK Build Number: 0fd84a2
Titanium Mobile SDK Location: /home/paul/.titanium/mobilesdk/linux/2.1.1.GA
I could not reproduce the issue after many tries. The best solution would be to reinstall studio.

What would be the best way to un-install studio 
-or-
How would I re-install..

Running Umbumtu 12.04, when I open Studio I get:

An internal error has occurred.No more handlesNative code library failed to load. (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio/plugins/com.aptana.swt.webkitbrowser.linux.x86_1.0.0.1337568602/os/linux/x86/libcefjni.so: libjpeg.so.62: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
 
The file:
/home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio/plugins/com.aptana.swt.webkitbrowser.linux.x86_1.0.0.1337568602/
DOES EXIST and contains
/os/linux/x86/libcefjni.so

*** UN-Installed  &  Re-Installed ***
Same ERROR while   Launching Aptana Portal
ERROR
An internal error has occurred.
No more handlesNative code library failed to load. (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/paul/Downloads/Titanium_Studio/plugins/com.aptana.swt.webkitbrowser.linux.x86_1.0.0.1337568602/os/linux/x86/libcefjni.so: libjpeg.so.62: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)

WEWRE are the other comments.  There was one from another problem solver and it contained a GOOD answer for the issue that I am having.  i.e. There additional comments for this Issue that are not showing - where are they as the last one contains the Answer.  
Thanks,
Paul

Hi Paul,

I saw your comments last on that ticket saying the dashboard started working for you. I dont see any other comments either. If you are still having issues, please comment on the other ticket.

Thanks,
Varun
